summary: Adds Alcohol to the Cooking Pot Menu
descriptionHtml:
This mod enables you to craft alcohol at the cooking pot crafting station. The following recipes are included:

-Ale
-2 Wheat
-2 gourd

-Nord Mead
-2 Wheat
-2 juniper berries
-2 honeycomb

-Wine
-2 snowberries
-2 juniper berries

-Dragon\'s Breath Mead
-2 Wheat
-1 Juniper Berries
-1 Dragon\'s Tongue

-Firebrand Wine
-2 Juniper Berries
-2 Snowberries
-1 Frost MIrriam

-Colovian Brandy
-1 Wheat
-2 Tundra Cotton
-1 Skeever Tail

With Version 1.1
-Skooma
 -Moon Sugar
 -Empty Skooma Bottles

-Baked Potatoes
 -Potato
 -Salt Pile

-Grilled Leeks
 -Leek
 -Salt Pile


The recipes will show up under the Food section of the Cooking Pot.

Change Log:
V1.0:
-Initial Release
V1.1
-Added 3 new recipes
  -Skooma (found under MISC in the Cooking Pot)
  -Baked Potatoes
  -Grilled Leeks

Known Issues:
-The recipes themselves do not have unique editor ID\'s. This will be fixed when the Creation Kit Releases

This is the first mod that I have created for public use. Any feedback regarding how it can be improved will be greatly appreciated. Constructive Criticism is always welcome.
author: CP1172
